source: TEXT_JOBBLM540_01680_SEQ_00<tab>Lalai has received an unexpected letter.
target: TEXT_JOBBLM540_01680_SEQ_00<tab>ミルバネス礼拝堂のラライの元に、情報が入ったようだ。

source: TEXT_JOBBLM540_01680_SEQ_01<tab>Lalai has received a letter from 269th Order Mendicant Da Za. Though somewhat scarce of detail, the letter requests that you meet him at Bronze Lake. The timing of this unsolicited correspondence strongly suggests that Waldeve may be involved. Travel to Bronze Lake and ask Da Za what prompted this sudden communication while Lalai reluctantly informs Zhai'a Nelhah of this development.
target: TEXT_JOBBLM540_01680_SEQ_01<tab>ラライから、メンディカント269 ダ・ザから手紙があったと聞いた。高地ラノシアのブロンズレイクで、「メンディカント269 ダ・ザ」と話そう。

source: TEXT_JOBBLM540_01680_SEQ_02<tab>You find Da Za at Bronze Lake. He explains that he was indeed approached by Waldeve. The man spoke of the Defiant and asked Da Za to share his knowledge of black magic. The wily kobold asked for time to reconsider, arranging another meeting and an opportunity to ambush the dangerous man with your assistance. Travel to the meeting point at the northeast of Bronze Lake and lie in hiding nearby while Da Za waits for Waldeve.
target: TEXT_JOBBLM540_01680_SEQ_02<tab>メンディカント269 ダ・ザから、「まつろわぬ魔道士」を待ち伏せる作戦を提案された。ブロンズレイクの「<var 28 ((EObj)) F61E99DD01 /var>」で待機しよう。

source: TEXT_JOBBLM540_01680_SEQ_03<tab>Before long, the leader of the Defiant, Waldeve, arrives. He seems to have recently come into ownership of an ancient tome left by Ququruka─no doubt the Book of Thal. Unfortunately, Da Za's cunning plan for capturing the renegade black mage failed to account for the possibility of the man simply walking away. Waldeve may be gone, but his cultists remain. They know of the secrets passed down to Da Za from his ancestor, and Ququruka's friend, Da Gu, and they plan to extract these secrets from him...by any means necessary. Intervene before the outnumbered kobold is overpowered.
target: TEXT_JOBBLM540_01680_SEQ_03<tab><var 28 ((EObj)) F61E99DD01 /var>で待機していると、「まつろわぬ魔道士」の主導者ウォルディーヴが現れ、メンディカント269 ダ・ザを仲間へと勧誘してきた。誘いを断ったメンディカント269 ダ・ザに、ウォルディーヴは部下を差し向けてきた。ブロンズレイクで「まつろわぬ魔道士」の構成員を討伐しよう。

source: TEXT_JOBBLM540_01680_SEQ_04<tab>The battle with the Defiant mages is vicious and short. There are no survivors. Assist Da Za and confirm that he is unharmed.
target: TEXT_JOBBLM540_01680_SEQ_04<tab>「まつろわぬ魔道士」の構成員を討伐した。ブロンズレイクで「メンディカント269 ダ・ザ」を救助しよう。

source: TEXT_JOBBLM540_01680_SEQ_05<tab>Da Za thanks you for your help, expressing his awe at the raw destructive power you brought to bear on his assailants. Zhai'a Nelhah, having heard of Da Za's letter from Lalai, arrives in time to witness only the aftermath of your fight. He is utterly incensed that you have left not a single cultist alive. Furious that this promising opportunity to question Waldeve's men has been squandered, he storms away to speak with Lalai. Return to Milvaneth Sacrarium and attempt to spare her from the Miqo'te's fury.
target: TEXT_JOBBLM540_01680_SEQ_05<tab>メンディカント269 ダ・ザを救助した。そこに到着したザイ・ア・ネルハーに、「まつろわぬ魔道士」の構成員を殺したことを責められ、ラライの元まで来るように言われた。ウルダハに戻り、ミルバネス礼拝堂の「ラライ」と話そう。

source:
TEXT_JOBBLM540_01680_SEQ_06<tab>Zhai'a Nelhah confronts Lalai with the chilling parallels between your battle with the Defiant and the War of the Magi so many years ago. Though Lalai sympathizes with his concerns, she points out that it was not just black magic that brought about the Sixth Umbral Calamity─white magic, too, was involved. In any case, she doubts Zhai'a's claims that you were not in full control of your powers, and proves as much by entrusting you with even more powerful magicks that she gleaned from the Book of Nald in your absence.

※The next black mage quest will be available from Lalai upon reaching level 56.
target:
TEXT_JOBBLM540_01680_SEQ_06<tab>ザイ・ア・ネルハーは、冒険者と「まつろわぬ魔道士」が破壊の力をぶつけあうことで、「魔大戦」の再来となってしまうことを危惧していた。ラライは、冒険者ならその心配はないと信頼を寄せ、「まつろわぬ魔道士」に対向するために、新たな黒魔法を教えてくれた。

※黒魔道士のレベルが56以上になると、ミルバネス礼拝堂のラライから、次の黒魔道士クエストを受注することができます。

source: TEXT_JOBBLM540_01680_TODO_00<tab>Speak with 269th Order Mendicant Da Za.
target: TEXT_JOBBLM540_01680_TODO_00<tab>ブロンズレイクのメンディカント269 ダ・ザと話す

source: TEXT_JOBBLM540_01680_TODO_01<tab>Lie in wait at the specified location.
target: TEXT_JOBBLM540_01680_TODO_01<tab><var 28 ((EObj)) F61E99DD01 /var>で待機する

source: TEXT_JOBBLM540_01680_TODO_02<tab>Slay the Defiant mages.
target: TEXT_JOBBLM540_01680_TODO_02<tab>「まつろわぬ魔道士」の構成員を討伐

source: TEXT_JOBBLM540_01680_TODO_03<tab>Aid Da Za.
target: TEXT_JOBBLM540_01680_TODO_03<tab>メンディカント269 ダ・ザを救助する

source: TEXT_JOBBLM540_01680_TODO_04<tab>Report to Lalai at Milvaneth Sacrarium.
target: TEXT_JOBBLM540_01680_TODO_04<tab>ミルバネス礼拝堂のラライと話す

source: TEXT_JOBBLM540_01680_LALAI_000_000<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, I have received a letter from 269th Order Mendicant Da Za!
target:
TEXT_JOBBLM540_01680_LALAI_000_000<tab>黒魔道士<var 29 EB02 /var>よ！
なんと、レターモーグリを通じて、
メンディカント269 ダ・ザから、手紙が届きました！

source: TEXT_JOBBLM540_01680_LALAI_000_001<tab>The moogles' reach extends further than I had realized. But that Da Za would contact us suggests that something is very much amiss.
target:
TEXT_JOBBLM540_01680_LALAI_000_001<tab>まさか、コボルド族から手紙が届くなんて……。
何か起きたに違いありません！

source: TEXT_JOBBLM540_01680_LALAI_000_002<tab>“I wait at Bronze Lake,” it says, and no more than that. Though perhaps somewhat cryptic, the letter's brevity suggests a sense of urgency.
target:
TEXT_JOBBLM540_01680_LALAI_000_002<tab>あの頭でっかちが、役に立つとは思えませんが……
また喚かれるのも面倒ですので、
私は、ザイ・ア・ネルハーに手紙のことを伝えてきます。

source: TEXT_JOBBLM540_01680_LALAI_000_003<tab>Please hurry to Bronze Lake and investigate the situation! I shall inform Zhai'a Nelhah of this development. Though I doubt the fool can render much assistance, I gave my word that we would cooperate.
target:
TEXT_JOBBLM540_01680_LALAI_000_003<tab>手紙には「ブロンズレイクで待つ」と書かれていました。
あなたは、急いで現地に向かってください！

source: TEXT_JOBBLM540_01680_LALAI_000_004<tab>Please hurry to Bronze Lake and meet with Da Za. I shall inform Zhai'a Nelhah of the letter.
target:
TEXT_JOBBLM540_01680_LALAI_000_004<tab>私は、ザイ・ア・ネルハーに手紙のことを伝えておきます。
あなたは、急いで「ブロンズレイク」に向かってください！

source: TEXT_JOBBLM540_01680_DAZA_000_010<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! I am glad to see you─pleased, happy, glad.
target:
TEXT_JOBBLM540_01680_DAZA_000_010<tab>やあ　<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>　久しぶりだーね！
元気そーで　なによーり！

source: TEXT_JOBBLM540_01680_DAZA_000_011<tab>Kazagg Chah has told me what happened. This is grim news. Yes, yes, grim news indeed.
target:
TEXT_JOBBLM540_01680_DAZA_000_011<tab>お話　カザグ・チャーから　聞いたーよ。
なんだーか　事件　おきてーる　みたいねー。

source: TEXT_JOBBLM540_01680_DAZA_000_012<tab>The man Kazagg Chah spoke of approached me, too. Spoke of the Defiant. Said he wanted my knowledge─wisdom, insight, knowledge.
target:
TEXT_JOBBLM540_01680_DAZA_000_012<tab>ぼくーの　とこーろにも　そいつら　きたーよ！
「まつろわぬ魔道士」　言ってーた！
「お前の知識がほしい」　言われーた！

source: TEXT_JOBBLM540_01680_DAZA_000_013<tab>I told him I needed time to think─consider, ponder, think. I told him to return later. When he returns, we shall ambush him! Yes, yes, a sound plan, I think.
target:
TEXT_JOBBLM540_01680_DAZA_000_013<tab>考えさせてくーれ　伝えたーら　「また来る」　言われーた。
そこーで　まちぶーせ　だいさくせーん　だーよ！
ぼくー　ナイス　はんだーん！

source: TEXT_JOBBLM540_01680_DAZA_000_014<tab>I told him to meet me northeast of Bronze Lake. I shall approach as normal─as bait. <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, you lie in wait─ambush, hiding, wait.
target:
TEXT_JOBBLM540_01680_DAZA_000_014<tab>「ブロンズレイク」の北西でー　まちあわーせ　したーよ！
ぼくー　おとりになるかーら　見張ってーて！
それじゃ　いってみよー！

source: TEXT_JOBBLM540_01680_DAZA_000_020<tab>You! Are you the leader of the Defiant?
target:
TEXT_JOBBLM540_01680_DAZA_000_020<tab>あなたーが　「まつろわぬ魔道士」のー
リーダーさん　なーの？

source: TEXT_JOBBLM540_01680_WALDEVE_000_021<tab>My name is Waldeve. And you─you are descended from 1st Order Patriarch Da Gu, yes?
target:
TEXT_JOBBLM540_01680_WALDEVE_000_021<tab>ウォルディーヴという……。
コボルド族の筆頭術士だった「ダ・グ」の血をひく者だな？

source: TEXT_JOBBLM540_01680_DAZA_000_022<tab>Da Gu was my ancestor─progenitor, forebear, ancestor... You know him?
target:
TEXT_JOBBLM540_01680_DAZA_000_022<tab>ダ・グはー　ぼくーの　ご先祖さまだーよ！
ご先祖さまーを　知ってるーの？

source: TEXT_JOBBLM540_01680_WALDEVE_000_023<tab>I've had opportunity to peruse a fascinating tome left by Ququruka. In it, Da Gu is mentioned as a confidant who assisted the master in his studies of the dark arts.
target:
TEXT_JOBBLM540_01680_WALDEVE_000_023<tab>ククルカの遺した書物を目にする機会があってな……。
そこに研究の同志として、名前があったのだよ。

source: TEXT_JOBBLM540_01680_WALDEVE_000_024<tab>It also states that Ququruka intended to entrust the secrets of his research to those same confidants. I fully expect you to tell me all about these secrets.
target:
TEXT_JOBBLM540_01680_WALDEVE_000_024<tab>そして、その同志に「黒魔法に関する記録を託した」とも。
さあ、お前の持つ黒魔法の知識を、
我々のために教えてもらおうか……！

source: TEXT_JOBBLM540_01680_DAZA_000_025<tab>Then you are wrong─mistaken, incorrect, wrong! I shall reveal <var 1A 02 /var>nothing<var 1A 01 /var> to the likes of you!
target:
TEXT_JOBBLM540_01680_DAZA_000_025<tab>ふーんだ　おことわりだーよ！
お前らなんかーに　ご先祖さまーの　キロクーは
渡さないーぞ！

source: TEXT_JOBBLM540_01680_WALDEVE_000_026<tab>Hmph. I'm a busy man, Da Za. If you refuse to cooperate, I simply don't have time for you.
target:
TEXT_JOBBLM540_01680_WALDEVE_000_026<tab>それが答えか……。
残念だが、仲間として協力してもらえぬというのなら、
もう用はない……。

source: TEXT_JOBBLM540_01680_DAZA_000_027<tab>Wait! Where are you going!?
target: TEXT_JOBBLM540_01680_DAZA_000_027<tab>まーて　ウォルディーヴ　逃げるのーか！？

source: TEXT_JOBBLM540_01680_WALDEVE_000_028<tab>You might have made a powerful ally...but as an enemy, you cannot be suffered to live.
target:
TEXT_JOBBLM540_01680_WALDEVE_000_028<tab>逃げる……？
これは面白いことを言う……。
大丈夫、お前の相手は彼らが務めてくれる。

source: TEXT_JOBBLM540_01680_WALDEVE_000_029<tab>Find out everything he knows. Then kill him.
target: TEXT_JOBBLM540_01680_WALDEVE_000_029<tab>……記録を奪ったら、殺せ。

source: TEXT_JOBBLM540_01680_DAZA_000_040<tab>Thank you, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! Those Defiant didn't stand a chance! No, no, no chance at all!
target:
TEXT_JOBBLM540_01680_DAZA_000_040<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>　すごいーよ！
あっというまーに　たおしちゃったーね！

source: TEXT_JOBBLM540_01680_DAZA_000_041<tab>But Waldeve got away─fled, escaped, got away.
target:
TEXT_JOBBLM540_01680_DAZA_000_041<tab>でもー　ウォルディーヴ　いっちゃーった……。
おびき出す方法　また　考えなきゃーね……。

source: TEXT_JOBBLM540_01680_ZHAIANELHAH_000_042<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! Lalai relayed to me what happened.
target:
TEXT_JOBBLM540_01680_ZHAIANELHAH_000_042<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>、ここだったか！
ラライから連絡をもらったんだが、無事だったようだな。

source: TEXT_JOBBLM540_01680_ZHAIANELHAH_000_043<tab>These men... Were they Defiant mages?
target:
TEXT_JOBBLM540_01680_ZHAIANELHAH_000_043<tab>こ、これは……。
「まつろわぬ魔道士」の連中か……？

source: TEXT_JOBBLM540_01680_ZHAIANELHAH_000_044<tab>You fool! You've killed every last one of them! How do you intend for us to question them now!?
target:
TEXT_JOBBLM540_01680_ZHAIANELHAH_000_044<tab>なんだ、この惨状は……！
全員、死んでしまっているじゃないか！

source: TEXT_JOBBLM540_01680_ZHAIANELHAH_000_045<tab>I knew this would happen. You black mages are quick to wield your destructive powers, but rarely do you consider the consequences.
target:
TEXT_JOBBLM540_01680_ZHAIANELHAH_000_045<tab>やっぱり、僕の心配していたとおりじゃないか……。
考えなしに「破壊の力」を使うからだ！

source: TEXT_JOBBLM540_01680_ZHAIANELHAH_000_046<tab>We must return to Lalai. Do not think that I'll forget about what you have done here.
target:
TEXT_JOBBLM540_01680_ZHAIANELHAH_000_046<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>。
ラライのところまで来てもらおう……！
君が今回しでかしたことは、決して許されることではない！

source: TEXT_JOBBLM540_01680_DAZA_000_047<tab>Were you not in full control of your powers? Did your magicks run wild─amok, untamed, wild?
target:
TEXT_JOBBLM540_01680_DAZA_000_047<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>　威力の制御してたーよ？
こいつら　死んじゃったーの
本当ーに　<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>の　せいなーの？

source: TEXT_JOBBLM540_01680_DAZA_000_048<tab>Whatever the case, I do know that you saved me─rescued, protected, saved.
target:
TEXT_JOBBLM540_01680_DAZA_000_048<tab>真相　ぼくにーは　わからないけーど……
<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>　助けてくれたかーら
ぼくーは　無事だったーよ？

source: TEXT_JOBBLM540_01680_DAZA_000_049<tab>Thank you, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. I owe you my life.
target:
TEXT_JOBBLM540_01680_DAZA_000_049<tab>だかーら　ぼくーは　お礼　言うーね。
<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>　ありがとうだーよ。

source: TEXT_JOBBLM540_01680_DAZA_000_050<tab>You should hurry to Ul'dah. Much as you protected me from the Defiant, I suspect Lalai may benefit from protection from that Miqo'te. Yes, yes, hurry to Ul'dah.
target:
TEXT_JOBBLM540_01680_DAZA_000_050<tab>とりあえーず　「ウルダハ」に戻ったーら？
あのままーじゃ　ラライとあのミコッテ族
喧嘩に　なっちゃーうよ。

source: TEXT_JOBBLM540_01680_DAZA_000_051<tab>Hurry back to Ul'dah, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. Stop Lalai and the Miqo'te from fighting─quarreling, bickering, fighting.
target:
TEXT_JOBBLM540_01680_DAZA_000_051<tab>とりあえーず　「ウルダハ」に戻ったーら？
あのままーじゃ　ラライとあのミコッテ族
喧嘩に　なっちゃーうよ。

source: TEXT_JOBBLM540_01680_ZHAIANELHAH_000_060<tab>Hmph. You're finally here.
target: TEXT_JOBBLM540_01680_ZHAIANELHAH_000_060<tab>………………来たか。

source: TEXT_JOBBLM540_01680_LALAI_000_070<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, Zhai'a Nelhah has been standing there, silently fuming, for quite some time now. What has transpired?
target:
TEXT_JOBBLM540_01680_LALAI_000_070<tab>…………<var 29 EB02 /var>よ。
ここで、黙ったままムッスリしてる男について、
説明してもらえますか？

source: TEXT_JOBBLM540_01680_LALAI_000_071<tab>So it was indeed Waldeve that stole the Book of Thal. And he has been studying the magicks inscribed within.
target:
TEXT_JOBBLM540_01680_LALAI_000_071<tab>やはり、敵は黒魔道士だったのですか……。
「ザルの書」の記述から、黒魔法を修得したのでしょう。

source: TEXT_JOBBLM540_01680_LALAI_000_072<tab>But did truly not a single Defiant survive? I somehow doubt that you are fully responsible for─
target:
TEXT_JOBBLM540_01680_LALAI_000_072<tab>しかし、「まつろわぬ魔道士」の構成員が死んでしまったのは、
本当に<var 29 EB02 /var>の……。

source: TEXT_JOBBLM540_01680_ZHAIANELHAH_000_073<tab>I care not for your doubts! I explicitly told you not to interfere in my investigation!
target:
TEXT_JOBBLM540_01680_ZHAIANELHAH_000_073<tab>言い訳など聞きたくない……！
僕は、邪魔をするなと言ったはずだ。

source: TEXT_JOBBLM540_01680_ZHAIANELHAH_000_074<tab>If nothing else, this shows the bloody outcome of a battle between opposing black mages.
target:
TEXT_JOBBLM540_01680_ZHAIANELHAH_000_074<tab>同じ黒魔道士と相対してわかっただろう……。
「破壊の力」がぶつかりあえば、結果はどうなるか。

source: TEXT_JOBBLM540_01680_ZHAIANELHAH_000_075<tab>Fighting destructive power with more destructive power... It's such thinking that led to the War of the Magi. I'm sure I needn't remind you of the outcome of that war.
target:
TEXT_JOBBLM540_01680_ZHAIANELHAH_000_075<tab>強すぎる力がぶつかりあえば、そこには悲劇しか生まれない。
かつて、そうして「魔大戦」が引き起こされたように……！

source: TEXT_JOBBLM540_01680_ZHAIANELHAH_000_076<tab>I strongly recommend you give some thought to just how terrible a force you toy with.
target: TEXT_JOBBLM540_01680_ZHAIANELHAH_000_076<tab>己のふるう力の恐ろしさを、もう一度よく考えるんだな……。

source: TEXT_JOBBLM540_01680_LALAI_000_077<tab>The War of the Magi... I suppose I cannot blame him for seeing the parallels. A war between forces commanding unimaginably destructive magical power. But black magic is not purely to blame. It was the violent confluence of black <var 1A 02 /var>and<var 1A 01 /var> white magic that ultimately led to disaster.
target:
TEXT_JOBBLM540_01680_LALAI_000_077<tab>「魔大戦」…………。
破壊の力「黒魔法」や、癒やしの力「白魔法」など、
古の魔法がぶつかり合い、世の理を乱した恐ろしき戦い……。

source: TEXT_JOBBLM540_01680_LALAI_000_078<tab>It brought about the Sixth Umbral Calamity. It is only natural that the risk of a reoccurrence of those terrible events would instill great fear.
target:
TEXT_JOBBLM540_01680_LALAI_000_078<tab>古の昔、第六霊災の引き金になったとされる大戦です。
幻術士ギルドに所属するザイ・ア・ネルハーが、
その再来を恐れるのは、仕方のないことでしょう……。

source: TEXT_JOBBLM540_01680_LALAI_000_079<tab>I know you would never be so reckless as to allow something like that to happen.
target:
TEXT_JOBBLM540_01680_LALAI_000_079<tab>しかし、<var 29 EB02 /var>よ！
あなたが、そんな愚かなことをしでかす<var 08 E905 ((女)) ((男)) /var>ではないと、
私は知っています！

source: TEXT_JOBBLM540_01680_LALAI_000_080<tab>The problem lies not with black magic, but with the Defiant. I am disinclined to pay heed to Zhai'a Nelhah's words when they run counter to those of Da Za, who witnessed the battle firsthand.
target:
TEXT_JOBBLM540_01680_LALAI_000_080<tab>憎むべきは「黒魔法」ではなく、「まつろわぬ魔道士」たち！
耳を傾けるべきは、ザイ・ア・ネルハーの言葉ではなく、
現場にいた、ダ・ザの信頼の弁です！

source: TEXT_JOBBLM540_01680_LALAI_000_081<tab>I find it hard to believe that you would lose control of your powers. There must be some other explanation for the deaths of those mages...
target:
TEXT_JOBBLM540_01680_LALAI_000_081<tab>熟練の冒険者でもある、あなたが力の制御を誤ったとは、
私も思えません……。
敵が死亡してしまったのには、何か別の原因があるはずです！

source: TEXT_JOBBLM540_01680_LALAI_000_082<tab>It also seems that Waldeve is gathering something of a following. To better oppose this growing menace, I shall teach you a new spell I recently deciphered from the Book of Nald.
target:
TEXT_JOBBLM540_01680_LALAI_000_082<tab>ともかく、敵が黒魔道士の数を増やしているのは事実。
対抗するために、新たな力「激成魔」を授けましょう……！

source: TEXT_JOBBLM540_01680_LALAI_000_083<tab>Remember, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, black magic is not a thing to be feared. As a true black mage, you have the power to control it. I believe in you.
target:
TEXT_JOBBLM540_01680_LALAI_000_083<tab>……破壊の力を、恐れることはありません。
真の黒魔道士であるあなたなら、きっと制御できるはず。
私は、あなたを信じていますよ。

source: TEXT_JOBBLM540_01680_SYSTEM_000_084<tab>
target: TEXT_JOBBLM540_01680_SYSTEM_000_084<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）
